kood.description: Estonian political party registry code; possible values are numeric strings of 1 to 8 digits; regex: ^\d{1,8}$ // not unique // constraint: must be a numeric string between 1 and 8 digits

lehekylg.description: Page number in the result set; possible values are positive integers; regex: ^[1-9]\d*$ // not unique // constraint: must be a positive integer (no leading zeros)

kood.description: Estonian political party registry code; possible values are numeric strings of 1 to 8 digits; regex: ^\d{1,8}$ // not unique // constraint: must be a numeric string between 1 and 8 digits

nimi.description: Name of the political party; possible values are Estonian text strings (letters, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes, up to 255 characters); regex: ^[A-Za-zÕÄÖÜõäöü\-\' ]{1,255}$ // not unique // constraint: must be 1-255 characters, only Estonian letters, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes

esit_kpv.description: Date of submission; possible values are dates in the format YYYY-MM-DD; regex: ^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$ // not unique // constraint: must be a valid date in format YYYY-MM-DD

lehekylgede_arv.description: Number of pages in the result set; possible values are positive integers; regex: ^[1-9]\d*$ // not unique // constraint: must be a positive integer (no leading zeros)

isikukood.description: Estonian personal identification code; possible values are 11-digit numbers; regex: ^\d{11}$ // not unique // constraint: must be exactly 11 digits

eesnimi.description: First name of the party member; possible values are Estonian text strings (letters, hyphens, apostrophes, up to 100 characters); regex: ^[A-Za-zÕÄÖÜõäöü\-\' ]{1,100}$ // not unique // constraint: must be 1-100 characters, only Estonian letters, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes

perenimi.description: Last name of the party member; possible values are Estonian text strings (letters, hyphens, apostrophes, up to 100 characters); regex: ^[A-Za-zÕÄÖÜõäöü\-\' ]{1,100}$ // not unique // constraint: must be 1-100 characters, only Estonian letters, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes

liikmeks_astumise_aeg.description: Date of joining the party; possible values are dates in the format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDZ; regex: ^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}(Z)?$ // not unique // constraint: must be a valid date in format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDZ
